20101205170131.000|20101205170133.500|CCO|A FESTIVE DAY ON THE SOUTHSIDE 
20101205170133.500|20101205170136.000|CCO|OF CHICAGO.
20101205170136.000|20101205170138.500|CCO|THE ANNUAL PARADE CELEBRATING 
20101205170138.500|20101205170141.000|CCO|THE AFRICAN-AMERICAN COMMUNITY.
20101205170141.000|20101205170142.667|CCO|THEN A PICNIC IN WASHINGTON 
20101205170142.667|20101205170144.333|CCO|PARK.
20101205170144.333|20101205170146.000|CCO|THE PARTY CONTINUED LONG INTO 
20101205170146.000|20101205170147.667|CCO|THE HOT SUMMER NIGHT WHEN 
20101205170147.667|20101205170149.333|CCO|SEVERAL YOUNG MEN JUMPED THIS 
20101205170149.333|20101205170151.000|CCO|FENCE TO COOL OFF IN THE PARK 
20101205170151.000|20101205170153.000|CCO|SWIMMING POOL.
20101205170153.000|20101205170155.000|CCO|WATCHING FOR THE BLEACHERS WERE 
20101205170155.000|20101205170157.000|CCO|MARILYN GREEN AND HER FIANCE WHO
20101205170157.000|20101205170159.000|CCO|HAD GONE TO THE PARK WITH 
20101205170159.000|20101205170201.000|CCO|ANOTHER YOUNG COUPLE.
20101205170201.000|20101205170202.667|CCO|IT WAS 1:00 IN A NEIGHBORHOOD 
20101205170202.667|20101205170204.333|CCO|RIDDLED WITH GANGS, THE TIME AND
20101205170204.333|20101205170206.000|CCO|PLACE FOR TROUBLE.
20101205170206.000|20101205170207.667|CCO|FIVE SHOT IT IS RANG OUT AND 
20101205170207.667|20101205170209.333|CCO|MARILYN AND HER FIANCE WERE 
20101205170209.333|20101205170211.000|CCO|DEAD.
20101205170211.000|20101205170212.429|CCO|WILLIAM TAYLOR HAD BEEN SWIMMING
20101205170212.429|20101205170213.857|CCO|IN THE POOL.
20101205170213.857|20101205170215.286|CCO|>> DID YOU SEE THE GUN?
20101205170215.286|20101205170216.714|CCO|>> I SAW THE FLASH.
20101205170216.714|20101205170218.143|CCO|>> THEN YOU SAW SOMEONE 
20101205170218.143|20101205170219.571|CCO|RUNNINGING?
20101205170219.571|20101205170221.000|CCO|>> YES.
20101205170221.000|20101205170226.000|CCO|I SAW A MAN RUN PAST ME THAT 
20101205170226.000|20101205170231.000|CCO|LOOKED LIKE ANTHONY PORTER.
20101205170231.000|20101205170233.500|CCO|HE WAS WEARING LIGHT COLORS.
20101205170233.500|20101205170236.000|CCO|THE BELT, THE STRIDE, AND THE 
20101205170236.000|20101205170238.500|CCO|BLINK OF AN EYE.

20101205170241.000|20101205170242.667|CCO|THOUGHT IT LOOKED LIKE ANTHONY 
20101205170242.667|20101205170244.333|CCO|PORTER?
20101205170244.333|20101205170246.000|CCO|>> YES.
20101205170246.000|20101205170247.667|CCO|>> IT WAS OVER IN SECONDS.
20101205170247.667|20101205170249.333|CCO|DID YOU SEE HIS FACE, EYES, 
20101205170249.333|20101205170251.000|CCO|NOSE?
20101205170251.000|20101205170253.500|CCO|>> NO, I SAW THE SIDE OF HIM.
20101205170253.500|20101205170256.000|CCO|THE MAN WENT PAST ME SO FAST.
20101205170256.000|20101205170258.500|CCO|>> IT WAS THEED ABOUT LANGUAGE.
20101205170258.500|20101205170301.000|CCO|>> ANTHONY PORTER, THE NAME 
20101205170301.000|20101205170303.000|CCO|POLICE NEW ALL TOO WELL.
20101205170303.000|20101205170305.000|CCO|AT 27 HE HAD A SLEW OF ARRESTS 
20101205170305.000|20101205170307.000|CCO|AND THREE PREVIOUS CONVICTIONS.
20101205170307.000|20101205170309.000|CCO|A GANG MEMBER.
20101205170309.000|20101205170311.000|CCO|ON THE NIGHT OF THE MORES HE WAS
20101205170311.000|20101205170313.000|CCO|WANTED FOR ANOTHER SHOOTING, A 
20101205170313.000|20101205170315.000|CCO|MAN WHO HAD BEEN WALKING IN THE 
20101205170315.000|20101205170317.000|CCO|NEIGHBORHOOD.
20101205170317.000|20101205170319.000|CCO|>> YOU KNEW WHO ANTHONY PORTER 
20101205170319.000|20101205170321.000|CCO|WAS AND THE KIND OF PERSON?
20101205170321.000|20101205170323.000|CCO|>> WHO DIDN'T?
20101205170323.000|20101205170325.000|CCO|>> ANTHONY PORTER WAS KNOWN AS A
20101205170325.000|20101205170327.000|CCO|SERIOUS TROUBLE MAKER.
20101205170327.000|20101205170329.000|CCO|A GANG BANGER IN THE 
20101205170329.000|20101205170331.000|CCO|NEIGHBORHOOD WHO HAD BEEN 
20101205170331.000|20101205170332.667|CCO|ARRESTED NUMEROUS TIMES.
20101205170332.667|20101205170334.333|CCO|WHEN ONE OF THE BALANCES SAID HE
20101205170334.333|20101205170336.000|CCO|THOUGHT HE SAW ANTHONY PORTER 
20101205170336.000|20101205170337.667|CCO|RUN BY HIM PRIOR TO THE 
20101205170337.667|20101205170339.333|CCO|SHOOTINGS, THE POLICE SEIZED ON 
20101205170339.333|20101205170341.000|CCO|THAT.
20101205170341.000|20101205170343.500|CCO|>> IN LESS THAN 48 HOURS, POLICE
20101205170343.500|20101205170346.000|CCO|GATHERED ALL THE EVIDENCE THEY 
20101205170346.000|20101205170348.500|CCO|FELT THEY NEEDED FOR AN ARREST.
20101205170348.500|20101205170351.000|CCO|THE COUPLE THAT ENTERED THE PARK
20101205170351.000|20101205170353.000|CCO|TOLD INVESTIGATORS THEY LEFT 
20101205170353.000|20101205170355.000|CCO|EARLIER AND DIDN'T SEE ANYTHING.
20101205170355.000|20101205170357.000|CCO|POLICE HAD THREE KEY WITNESSES.
20101205170357.000|20101205170359.000|CCO|ANTHONY PORTER WAS PICKED OUT OF
20101205170359.000|20101205170401.000|CCO|A LINEUP AND CHARGED WITH THE 
20101205170401.000|20101205170403.000|CCO|DOUBLE MURDER.
20101205170403.000|20101205170405.000|CCO|>> TWO YOUNG PEOPLE WERE DEAD 
20101205170405.000|20101205170407.000|CCO|AND THEY WERE DEAD FOR NO GOOD

20101205170409.000|20101205170411.000|CCO|>> THE FORMER JUDGE PRESIDED AT 
20101205170411.000|20101205170412.667|CCO|HIS TRIAL.

20101205170414.333|20101205170416.000|CCO|CASE AGAINST ANTHONY PORTER?

20101205170417.667|20101205170419.333|CCO|PORTER WAS A PRETTY COMPELLING 
20101205170419.333|20101205170421.000|CCO|CASE.
20101205170421.000|20101205170423.000|CCO|>> THROUGHOUT THE TRIAL, PORTER 
20101205170423.000|20101205170425.000|CCO|INSISTED HE WAS INNOCENT.
20101205170425.000|20101205170427.000|CCO|ONE PROSECUTION WITNESS AFTER 
20101205170427.000|20101205170429.000|CCO|ANOTHER PLACED HIM AT THE CRIME 
20101205170429.000|20101205170431.000|CCO|SCENE.
20101205170431.000|20101205170433.000|CCO|ONE OF THE MEN AT THE POOL 
20101205170433.000|20101205170435.000|CCO|CLAIMED PORTER ROBBED HIM 
20101205170435.000|20101205170437.000|CCO|MINUTES BEFORE THE SHOOTING.

20101205170439.000|20101205170441.000|CCO|NEIGHBORHOOD AND HE SAID HE 
20101205170441.000|20101205170443.000|CCO|POINTED A GUN AND SAID GIVE ME 
20101205170443.000|20101205170445.000|CCO|YOUR WALLET AND YOUR MONEY.
20101205170445.000|20101205170447.000|CCO|HE GOT OUT OF THE POOL AND TOOK 
20101205170447.000|20101205170449.000|CCO|THE MONEY OUT OF HIS POCKET AND 
20101205170449.000|20101205170451.000|CCO|GAVE IT TO HIM AT GUNPOINT.

20101205170452.667|20101205170454.333|CCO|STOPPED THE MAN RUNNING FROM THE

20101205170518.500|20101205170521.000|CCO|WILLIAM TAYLOR TOLD THE JURY HE

20101205170627.667|20101205170629.333|CCO|>> ANTHONY PORTER.

20101205170631.000|20101205170633.000|CCO|THREE WITNESSES AND A CRIME 
20101205170633.000|20101205170635.000|CCO|SCENE PHOTOGRAPHER, A FRIEND AND
20101205170635.000|20101205170637.000|CCO|A FAMILY MEMBER WHO TESTIFIED 
20101205170637.000|20101205170639.000|CCO|PORTER WITH WITH THEM THAT 
20101205170639.000|20101205170641.000|CCO|NIGHT.
20101205170641.000|20101205170643.000|CCO|>> HIS ALIBI IS HE WAS HOME WITH
20101205170643.000|20101205170645.000|CCO|AS FAMILY DRINKING AND PLAYING 
20101205170645.000|20101205170647.000|CCO|CARDS UNTIL 3:00 IN THE MORNING.
20101205170647.000|20101205170649.000|CCO|>> RIGHT.
20101205170649.000|20101205170651.000|CCO|>> IN THE CLOSING ARGUMENTS, 
20101205170651.000|20101205170653.500|CCO|PROSECUTORS REJECTED THE ALIBI 
20101205170653.500|20101205170656.000|CCO|AND REED THE JURORS OF ALL THE 
20101205170656.000|20101205170658.500|CCO|EVIDENCE THEY HAD.
20101205170658.500|20101205170701.000|CCO|HE WAS A BAD MAN WITH A RECORD.
20101205170701.000|20101205170703.500|CCO|HE HAD GONE TO THE POOL THAT 
20101205170703.500|20101205170706.000|CCO|NIGHT, ROBBED A PERSON AT 
20101205170706.000|20101205170708.500|CCO|GUNPOINT AND WALKED UP INTO THE 
20101205170708.500|20101205170711.000|CCO|BLEACHER AND SHOT MARILYN GREEN 
20101205170711.000|20101205170712.250|CCO|THREE TIMES AND KILLED HER 
20101205170712.250|20101205170713.500|CCO|FINANCY.
20101205170713.500|20101205170714.750|CCO|THE EYEWITNESS OF THE MURDERS 
20101205170714.750|20101205170716.000|CCO|POINTED AT HIM.
20101205170716.000|20101205170717.250|CCO|A POLICE OFFICER TESTIFIED HE 
20101205170717.250|20101205170718.500|CCO|STOPPED PORTER AS HE RAN FROM 
20101205170718.500|20101205170719.750|CCO|THE PARK.
20101205170719.750|20101205170721.000|CCO|FOR ALL THE EVIDENCE THE 
20101205170721.000|20101205170722.667|CCO|PROSECUTION HAD, THERE WAS 
20101205170722.667|20101205170724.333|CCO|SOMETHING MISSING.

20101205170726.000|20101205170727.667|CCO|THAT LINKED PORTER TO THE CRIME?
20101205170727.667|20101205170729.333|CCO|FINGERPRINTS OR A MURDER WEAPON?
20101205170729.333|20101205170731.000|CCO|>> I DON'T THINK THEY RECOVERED 
20101205170731.000|20101205170732.429|CCO|A WEAPON, BUT THAT'S NOT 
20101205170732.429|20101205170733.857|CCO|UNUSUAL.
20101205170733.857|20101205170735.286|CCO|THE MURDER WEAPONS ARE DITCHED 
20101205170735.286|20101205170736.714|CCO|QUITE OFTEN.
20101205170736.714|20101205170738.143|CCO|FINGERPRINTS, I DON'T THINK 
20101205170738.143|20101205170739.571|CCO|THERE WERE ANY FINGERPRINTS ON 
20101205170739.571|20101205170741.000|CCO|ANY IDENTIFIABLE OBJECTS, BUT 
20101205170741.000|20101205170742.667|CCO|YOU HAVE TO LOOK AT THE

20101205170746.000|20101205170747.667|CCO|HE SUPPOSEDLY CAME UP AND SHOT 
20101205170747.667|20101205170749.333|CCO|THEM BOTH IN THE HEAD.
20101205170749.333|20101205170751.000|CCO|HE DIDN'T TOUCH THEM 
20101205170751.000|20101205170753.000|CCO|NECESSARILY.
20101205170753.000|20101205170755.000|CCO|>> WAS THERE A MOTIVE?
20101205170755.000|20101205170757.000|CCO|>> NO MOTIVE NECESSARY.
20101205170757.000|20101205170759.000|CCO|YOU DON'T HAVE TO PRESENT A 
20101205170759.000|20101205170801.000|CCO|MOTIVE FOR THE CRIME.
20101205170801.000|20101205170802.667|CCO|YOU PRESENT THE FACT THAT THE 
20101205170802.667|20101205170804.333|CCO|FELLOW WAS THERE AND TWO 
20101205170804.333|20101205170806.000|CCO|EYEWITNESSS PUT HIM AT THE 
20101205170806.000|20101205170807.667|CCO|SCENE.
20101205170807.667|20101205170809.333|CCO|>> AFTER NINE HOURS OF 
20101205170809.333|20101205170811.000|CCO|DELIBERATION, THE JURY RETURNED 
20101205170811.000|20101205170813.000|CCO|THE VERDICT.
20101205170813.000|20101205170815.000|CCO|GUILTIY OF THE ARMED ROBBERY AND
20101205170815.000|20101205170817.000|CCO|GUILTY OF THE DOUBLE MURDER.
20101205170817.000|20101205170819.000|CCO|PORTER'S FAMILY STOOD BEHIND 
20101205170819.000|20101205170821.000|CCO|HIM, BUT DIDN'T HAVE THE MONEY 
20101205170821.000|20101205170823.000|CCO|TO PAY THE ATTORNEY'S FEES.
20101205170823.000|20101205170825.000|CCO|TO CUT COST, ONE LAWYER ADVISED 
20101205170825.000|20101205170827.000|CCO|HIM TO FOREGO EXPENSIVE 
20101205170827.000|20101205170829.000|CCO|SENTENCING AND LET THE JUDGE 
20101205170829.000|20101205170831.000|CCO|DECIDE HIS SENTENCE.
20101205170831.000|20101205170833.000|CCO|IN PRISON OR DEATH.
20101205170833.000|20101205170835.000|CCO|>> DO YOU QUESTION THE EVIDENCE 
20101205170835.000|20101205170837.000|CCO|THAT'S BEEN PRESENT AND SAY 
20101205170837.000|20101205170839.000|CCO|PROVE IT?

20101205172546.000|20101205172547.667|CCO|>> AND THE MORE THEY DUG, THE
